description:
Your Global Weather Companion Across Every Horizon ArabiaWeather delivers precision beyond borders—accurate forecasts for the Arab world and every corner of the globe. Available in Arabic and English, we empower you to master your day, whether you're facing rain, snow, storms, or hurricanes. From personalized clothing recommendations to activity planning, our app transforms weather uncertainty into confident living. Connect with our Raseed community, explore nature, share your weather experiences in the past and present, and even predict tomorrow all within a single, powerful application.


Weather intelligence at your fingertips with hyperlocal and global insights, ArabiaWeather provides hourly forecasts and personalized lifestyle recommendations. Stay informed, prepared, and ahead—wherever you are.


Weather Forecasts


Precision Weather Forecasting: Your Day, Decoded
Navigate life with confidence through our comprehensive daily and hourly weather intelligence. From dawn to dusk, get a complete atmospheric snapshot including precise temperature readings, "feels like" conditions, humidity levels, wind dynamics, and rain probability. Plan your day with certainty, whether you're preparing for work, leisure, or adventure—ArabiaWeather puts the power of prediction in your hands.



Satellite Vision
Dive into visual forecasting that goes beyond traditional predictions. Trace and detect emerging fog banks, dust storms, and monitor cloud top temperatures. With our satellite technology, you're not just watching the weather; you're anticipating its every move, staying perpetually one step ahead of nature's unpredictable choreography.


WIDGETS


Small but mighty, our widgets transform your home screen into a powerful meteorological dashboard. With a single glance, stay ahead of weather intelligence that keeps you informed, prepared, and one step ahead of whatever the sky has planned.




Raseed: Your Weather Community, Your Meteorological Voice


Transform from a weather observer to a citizen scientist with Raseed, ArabiaWeather's interactive community platform. Share captivating stories, stunning images, and insightful voice notes about local weather phenomena, historical climate patterns, and your own weather predictions. Become more than just a user—become a passionate weather forecaster, connecting with like-minded enthusiasts and contributing to a global network of atmospheric storytellers. Your observations matter, your insights count, and your weather journey starts here.



Lifestyle: Your Personalized Weather Guide


Activities: Plan your day with weather-smart activity suggestions. ArabiaWeather turns unpredictable conditions into opportunities, helping you choose activities that align with the forecast.
Health: Stay ahead of health risks like headaches, allergies, or colds with predictive alerts. Protect yourself and your loved ones through proactive weather-driven insights.
Clothing: Get personalized outfit recommendations for every temperature change. Whether it’s a sunny day or a chilly evening, dress comfortably and confidently with ArabiaWeather.



And a lot more features made for you:


Sunrise and Sunset Times
Prayer Times
Weather Summary
Change parameters Unit to what site you
Language Arabic or English as you prefer
Search any location you want and if you don't find it you can just ask for it
Support for Accessibility
Arabiaweather app is the ultimate weather tool, precise and reliable. But there's more, our in-app features take it to the next level:


• 14-day weather forecasts
• 336 hourly forecasts
• 6-month long-term forecasts
• Seasonal text forecasts
• 14 days of lifestyle and activities
• 14 days of clothes recommendation
• Weather tracking in up to 10 locations
• No ads




Terms of Use: https://s3-eu-west-1.amazonaws.com/arabiaweather-app-assets/static_pages/v2/ios/terms/en.html


Privacy Policy: https://s3-eu-west-1.amazonaws.com/arabiaweather-app-assets/static_pages/v2/ios/privacy/en.html

A UNIQUE WEATHER FORECAST VISUALISATION
While most weather forecasting apps rely only on free global models, Windy has gone a few steps further and invested heavily in the most accurate models available, always at the highest possible resolution, to ensure accurate weather forecasts. 

WEATHER RADAR & SATELLITE IMAGERY
A weather radar is the most requested tool for weather forecasting. To provide the most accurate radar imagery, we constantly expand our resources so that rain, snow, and storms don't catch you by surprise. Trusted sources include NOAA, Met Office, AROME, DWD, JMA, ACCESS, and others.

MORE THAN 50 WEATHER MAPS AND TOOLS

- Wind forecast (current speed, gusts, accumulation, models comparison, data from weather stations)
- Temperature, humidity, pressure, dew point, freezing altitude
- Rain, thunder, storms, precipitation type, CAPE-index
- Weather radar and Satellite images (blue, infrared, visible)
- Clouds, clouds tops, clouds base and visibility (LIFR, IFR, MVFR, VFR), fog
- Waves, swell, currents
- Solar activity maps (solar power, UV index, wet-bulb temperature)
- Snow depth, new snow, snow density
- NO2, PM 2.5, Aerosol, SO2, Ozone layer, Surface ozone, CO concentration, Dust mass
- Weather warnings & Extreme forecast 
- Soil moisture, Moisture anomaly, Drought intensity, Fire Danger, Fuel Moisture

Available global weather models and resolution: 
- ECMWF
- GFS by NOAA 
- ICON by DWD 

Available local weather models
- HRRR by NOAA
- NAM by NOAA 
- HRDPS by MSC 
- ICON-EU by DWD
- ICON-D2 by DWD
- UKV by British Met Office
- AROME-HD by Météo France
- ALADIN by CHMI
- NEMS by meteoblue
- MSM by JMA
- ACCESS-C by Australian BoM


CUSTOM WEATHER ALERTS
- Want to know about essential weather forecasts before everyone else? Set up a custom alert based on the weather in your favorite location. Whether it's wind strength, precipitation, or temperature.

HURRICANE TRACKING, STORM TRACKING
With Windy's hurricane tracking tool, you can track a hurricane's past and projected path. Windy doesn't rely on just one hurricane model but will give you all the forecasts available for a storm or hurricane.

WEATHER WIDGETS for iOS, iPadOS, MacOS
Windy serves up a quick weather overview on your iPhone, iPad, or Mac, as well as live radar by NOAA, Met Office, Meteo France, DWD, JMA, ACCESS, and many other trusted sources. You can choose from several view sizes and types. 3-5 day forecast, live weather radar, live satellite, or a simple lock screen overview.

TOOLS MADE FOR PILOTS
- 16 altitude levels from the surface to 13.5km/FL450
- 50k+ Airports searchable by ICAO and IATA, including runway info, decoded & raw METARs, TAFs and NOTAMs
- Detailed Airgram and Meteogram
- Thermals forecast 
- Meteogram: temperature and dew point, wind speed and wind gusts, pressure, precipitation, altitude cloud cover
- Route planner 

WINDY FOR APPLE WATCH
Forecast, radar, METARs, and wind information in a small, lovely package.
Use the Apple Watch face by Windy.com to have it all on your screen anytime. 

Terms of Use: https://account.windy.com/agreements/windy-terms-of-use
Privacy Policy: https://account.windy.com/agreements/windy-privacy-policy

GET IN TOUCH with Windy
Join us at community.windy.com to discuss weather-related topics, report bugs, or suggest a new feature. Or contact us at info@windy.com on any topic.

FOLLOW Windy ON SOCIAL MEDIA
- Facebook: facebook.com/windyforecast
- X: X.com/windycom
- Threads: https://www.threads.net/@windy_forecast
- Instagram: instagram.com/windy_forecast
- YouTube: youtube.com/@Windyforecast

Get forecasts up to 16 days ahead, with detailed hour-by-hour data for the next 96 hours. Customize the experience to focus on what matters most to you — from temperature and precipitation to wind, humidity, UV index, and air quality. Explore real-time radar maps to track rain, snow, ice and cyclones in your area. Stay notified about today’s conditions and tomorrow’s outlook.
Whether you’re planning a busy week, heading outdoors, or just wondering if you’ll need a jacket, this app delivers accurate, reliable weather — fast and easy to read.
Optimized for both iPhone and iPad, with adaptive layouts to provide the best experience across all screen sizes.

# Accurate Forecasts
Stay informed with 16-day extended forecasts and 96-hour hourly breakdowns. Access key data like temperature, rain probability, wind speed and direction, cloud cover, humidity, UV index, and more — all in a single view.

# Interactive Radar Maps
Track rain, snow, ice, and cyclones in real time with high-resolution radar. Follow weather patterns around you and anticipate changes before they happen.

# Real-Time Air Quality
Keep an eye on air quality with detailed AQI readings, including PM2.5, PM10, ozone, nitrogen dioxide, carbon monoxide, and sulfur dioxide levels — updated live and presented clearly.

# Customizable Interface
Make the app your own. Choose the metrics you want to display, rearrange forecast blocks, switch between metric and imperial units, and set morning and evening weather reports at your preferred time.

# Notifications
Get timely alerts with daily summaries for the current day and upcoming forecasts — so you’re always a step ahead.

# Multiple Locations
Check the weather in all your favorite places. Your current location updates automatically using GPS, with quick access to saved locations around the world.

# Designed for Clarity
Every detail is organized for ease of use, whether you’re a casual user or a weather power user. A clean, modern interface makes checking the forecast feel effortless.


***

Some features, including Interactive Radar Maps and Real-Time Air Quality, are available with a paid subscription (3 days free, then $12.99/month or $29.99/year).

Privacy Policy: https://www.apptico.fr/weather/privacy-policy
Terms and Conditions: https://www.apptico.fr/weather/terms-and-conditions
EULA: https://www.apptico.fr/weather/eula

Thermometer - Weather: Outdoor Temperature & Reliable Forecasts

Are you looking for an accurate and reliable weather app to know the current temperature, humidity, atmospheric pressure and get detailed weather forecast?

Thermometer - Weather is the ideal tool to check local weather and outdoor temperature with short and long term forecasts.

Key Features

Outdoor Temperature: Get the current temperature wherever you are with live weather data
Accurate Weather Forecast: Check 7-day weather with detailed forecast graphs
Humidity and atmospheric pressure: follow complete weather conditions in real time
Thermal feeling: discover the perceived temperature taking into account wind and humidity
Automatic geolocation: instantly get the weather for your current location
Search for any location: check the temperature and weather anywhere in the world
Stylish Weather Widgets: Add a thermometer widget to your home screen to check the weather at a glance
Unit customization: choose between Celsius and Fahrenheit, hPa or mmHg according to your preference
Multi-location weather: Save and track weather in multiple locations at once
Fast and intuitive application: a clear and fluid interface for reliable weather in an instant

A complete weather app for all your needs

Whether you're traveling, at work or at home, Thermometer - Weather gives you quick access to outdoor temperature, local weather and accurate atmospheric conditions.

With 7-day forecasts and detailed graphs, you can anticipate the weather and prepare your activities with complete peace of mind.

With its modern weather widgets, follow the current temperature and weather forecast without even opening the app.

Get temperature and weather anywhere, instantly

Automatic geolocation: the app detects your current location to display accurate weather data for your city
Search for any location: Going on a trip? Check the weather at your destination before you go

Why choose Thermometer - Weather

More than just a thermometer, it combines a digital thermometer with detailed and reliable weather
Ultra-precise: real-time weather data for optimum accuracy
Simple and fast: an intuitive interface, customizable widgets and quick access to weather forecasts
Compatible with all iPhones and optimized for battery preservation

Download Thermometer - Weather now and keep an eye on the outdoor temperature and weather with ease.

Apple's standard terms of use apply to all subscriptions available in the app. You can find all the information by following this link: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

Weather Now – Your Premium Weather Advantage

Stop guessing the weather — start controlling your day.
Weather Now gives you the power to see exactly what’s coming, with pinpoint-accurate forecasts, live Doppler radar, stunning real-time visuals, and Premium Widgets that keep critical weather data at your fingertips.

Plan smarter, travel safer, and enjoy every moment — whether it’s clear skies, sudden storms, or shifting winds.

Why Weather Now Stands Out
	•	Ultra-accurate hourly & 14-day forecasts anywhere in the world
	•	Live Doppler radar for temperature, wind, precipitation, and storms
	•	Interactive 3D Earth globe with real-time weather layers
	•	Premium Widgets – more sizes, designs, and layouts for Home & Lock Screen, plus detailed charts for temperature, precipitation, wind, and hourly trends
	•	Severe weather alerts before conditions change
	•	Apple Watch support with live complications and instant updates
	•	Lightning-fast city search with smart suggestions

Go Premium – Maximize Your Forecast Power
	•	Multiple pro-level weather data sources for unbeatable accuracy
	•	Unlimited saved locations worldwide
	•	Complete map access: real-time radar, wind flow, pressure systems, clouds, and precipitation
	•	Professional-grade storm tracking tools used by experts
	•	Morning & evening notifications with full daily details

For Every Situation
	•	Planning outdoor events? Know exactly when rain will hit.
	•	Traveling? Track weather for every stop on your trip.
	•	Hiking or photography? Catch the perfect conditions.

Apple Watch Ready – Live forecasts and alerts on your wrist.
Family Sharing – One Premium subscription covers your whole household.

Subscription Options
	•	1 month – short-term access
	•	1 year with 7-day trial – best value for unlimited Premium

Payment is charged to your Apple ID at purchase. Renews automatically unless canceled at least 24 hours before the period ends. Manage or cancel anytime in account settings. Unused portions are non-refundable.

Terms: weathernow.app/term-of-use.html

The Weather forecast & Alerts is the World's Most Accurate Forecaster app. In addition to our daily forecasts, hourly details and 24-Hour Future Radar, you also can personalize your weather preferences from skin health to air quality index forecast and more.

Our live Doppler radar maps, storm watch, and hurricane tracker can warn you ahead of time of severe storms, heavy rain, heat waves, or an incoming flood. Track air quality and wildfires in your area. Severe weather is increasing across the nation - our severe weather alerts have you covered. 

Live weather with Weather Alerts

Download The Weather forecast & Alerts to get you through storm season, hurricane season & extreme weather warnings.

The Weather forecast & Alerts Features:
- Exact forecast: provide a 72-hour forecast about temperature and weather forecast info. 
- Worldwide coverage: local weather and global weather, accurate track of the world's thousands of cities. 
- Powerful doppler radar: useful if you want to track tropical storms or potential severe weather. 
- Today module: sunrise sunset, weather details, air quality, health & life index, probability of rainfall, condition of wind. 
- Animated weather interface: following weather changes. 
- Temperature: switch between Celsius and Fahrenheit. 
- Simple Weather: Clear UI and intuitive navigation. 
- Customization: localize to time and languages of different countries and regions. 
- Forecast: accurate forecast rainfall and snowfall with weather radar map 
- Accurate positioning: automatically locate your position, and able to track weather in multiple locations.

Weather forecast & Alerts, your personalized weather guardian & weather channel! Download for free now and be a weather expert!

About the In-App Subscription:

--Subscription period: "Weather Premiere - Monthly" (continuous monthly subscription product), "Weather Premiere - Yearly" (continuous annual subscription product), "Weather Premiere - Permanently"
--Payment: After user confirms the purchase and pays, it will be billed through your Apple ID account
--Cancel renewal: If you need to cancel the renewal, please manually turn off the automatic renewal function in the iTunes/Apple ID setting management 24 hours before the current subscription period expires
--Renewal: Apple’s iTunes account will be deducted within 24 hours before expiration. After the deduction is successful, the subscription period will be extended by one subscription period.
--Privacy Policy: http://privacypolicy.oss-us-west-1.aliyuncs.com/protocol/privacy.txt
--EULA: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

Windy.app - wind, waves and weather forecast app for surfers, kitesurfers, windsurfers, sailors, fishermen and other wind sports. 

FEATURES:
•  Wind report, forecast and statistics: wind map, accurate wind compass, wind meter, wind gusts and wind directions. It’s very useful for extreme wind sports.
•  Wind alert: Set up windalert and be aware of wind, storm and tornado warning via push-notifications
•  Weather history (archive) for 2012-2024: view wind data, temperature (day and night) and atmospheric pressure. Weather archive will help you to choose the best month for travel to the spot.
•  Local forecast from NOAA: temperature in Celsius, Fahrenheit and Kelvin, humidity, wind speed, precipitation (rain and snow). Forecast for 10 days with 3 hours step in metric or imperial units: m/s (mps), mph, km/h, knt (knout), bft (beaufort), m, ft, mm, cm, in, hPa, inHg. NOAA is a National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration / National Weather Service (nws).
•  Wave forecast: ocean or sea conditions, ocean waves and sea swell, fishing forecast
•  Animated wind tracker: weather radar for sailing, yachting and kiting in light wind
•  Cloud base/Dewpoint (dew point) data: necessary weather information for pleasant paragliding 
•  Spots: over 30.000 spots sorted and located by the type and area. Add your spots to favourites.
•  Spot chats. Got anemometer? Share info about weather conditions and wind direction in the chat from a kite spot.
•  Community: exchange weather reports on the spot. Want to be a local/spot leader? Email us the name of your spot at feedback@catchwind.co and we will create a chat for it.
•  Weather Stations: online data from nearby online weather stations.
•  Offline Mode: activate offline mode and check the forecast for your activities without internet connection.

PERFECT FOR:
• Kitesurfing (kitesurf)
• Windsurfing (wind surf)
• Surfing
• Sailing (Boating)
• Yachting
• Paragliding
• Fishing
• Snowkiting 
• Snowboarding
• Skiing
• Skydiving
• Kayaking (kayak)
• Wakeboarding
• Cycling
• Hunting (hunt)
• Golf

--------------------------
The free version allows you to use basic app functions.
WINDY PRO Account auto-renewable subscription allows using all functions of this app. Subscription length periods: 1 month with 3 days free trial, and 1 year with 7 days free trial.
Payment for WINDY PRO Account subscriptions will be charged to your iTunes account at the time of purchase. Your subscription will be automatically renewed every 30 or 365 days. If you have never subscribed to a monthly Premium account subscription before, you will have the option of getting a free 3/7-day trial period. Cancelling the trial period will immediately disable your subscription.
Payment for subscription renewals will be charged to your account within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. You can disable subscription renewal in your iTunes account settings on your device.
Terms of Use:  https://windyapp.co/CustomMenuItems/34/en

This is a simple digital temperature and humidity meter app.
It provides you with outdoor temperature, humidity, and current time.
The app offers automatic updates at regular intervals and real-time information, making it convenient to use.
You can obtain temperature and humidity data for any location worldwide.

What can you do with "The Thermometer" App?
- Sleek design that provides instant visibility of outdoor temperature, humidity, and current time.
- Automatic updates to keep you informed about the latest outdoor temperature and humidity.
- Option to select your desired location for accurate data.
- Customizable color scheme, allowing you to personalize the background and text colors.
- Ability to select between Celsius and Fahrenheit.

The premium plan allows you to use the app more comfortably.

What can you do with the Premium Plan?
-  A function to save multiple locations and instantly check the temperature and humidity of each
- No ads

"The Thermometer" app allows you to quickly check the outdoor temperature and humidity while also functioning as a clock. With the ability to customize the colors of the app, you can create a stylish and personalized display that complements your interior design.

~ WEATHER DOESN’T HAVE TO BE BORING ~
The simple weather app that’s winning awards (Apple Design Award, Best Weather Apps) and impressing tastemakers (MKBHD, Fast Company).

~ PLAYFUL YET FUNCTIONAL DESIGN ~
Turn your daily weather forecast into a memorable experience with a next-generation user interface design inspired by 3D video games. Feel the rain, hear the thunder, and watch the wind blow across your screen in vivid detail.

~ TOP WEATHER SOURCES ~
Powered by local data from the best weather sources like Accuweather, Foreca, Apple Weather, and the National Weather Service for the most local, most accurate forecasts.

~ MORE DETAILED ~
Explore every aspect of the weather for rich details on temperature changes, air quality (AQI), pollen reports, cloud cover, visibility, wind direction, rainfall, humidity, UV index, and much more. 

~ MINUTE FORECASTS™ ~
Designed for precise forecasts down to the minute. Know exactly when the downpour will start or when the dark sky will clear.

~ WIDGETS ~
Bring real-time weather data to your home screen and lock screen with simple widgets. Get frequent updates on the day’s temperature, conditions, rain, air quality, UV index, and wind conditions as they happen.

~ SEVERE WEATHER ALERTS ~
Keep an eye on severe weather alerts and be prepared for the next heat wave, storm tracking, flood risk, hurricane, blizzard, and more.

~ MOON PHASES ~
Astronomical moon phases and illumination. It’s simple to see when the next full moon and new moon are expected.

~ AIR QUALITY & POLLEN ~
Prepare for the outdoors with air quality index (AQI) and pollen forecasts. See AQI scores and pollen levels over the coming hours or days.

~ CUSTOM APP ICONS & SKINS ~
Collect app icons and custom skins that change the design of the entire app to match your mood. New icons, skins, and artist collaborations dropping regularly to keep your routine fresh.

~ MINIGAME & SURPRISES ~
Say hello to Cloudburst to pass the time or see how many hidden surprises you can find.

~ FREE OR UPGRADE ~
!Weather™ is free to use for as long as you need. Upgrade for realtime widgets, faster forecasts, more in-depth weather data like AQI and pollen, free skins, app icons, and wallpapers.

~ SUPER !BORING ~
Become a member and unlock access to all 5 Not Boring apps, skins, app icons, wallpapers, and more. We’re 100% member-supported. No ads, no data tracking.

Support: https://notboring.software/support

Room Temperature Thermometer – Accurate Indoor Temperature & Full Weather Insights
Stay comfortable and informed wherever you are! The Room Temperature Thermometer app is your personal weather station — right in your pocket. It not only tells you the exact room temperature, but also gives you a complete view of outdoor weather conditions, no matter where you are in the world.

 Key Features:
Room Temperature Measurement
Know your indoor temperature in real-time using your phone’s built-in sensors. Whether you’re at home, office, or in a hotel room, get accurate readings instantly. Ideal for maintaining comfort, monitoring room cooling/heating, or simply being aware of your surroundings.

Current Weather Conditions
Get up-to-date live weather data including temperature, weather conditions (like clear, rainy, cloudy), and more — based on your current location or any city you search for.

Humidity Tracker
Monitor the humidity level of your environment. Humidity plays a big role in comfort and health — now you can keep it under control with accurate humidity readings.

Wind Speed & Direction
Check wind speed and direction in real time. Whether you're planning an outdoor event or just want to stay informed during changing weather, this helps you prepare better.

Dew Point Info
Understand how humid the air feels with dew point readings. A higher dew point means more moisture in the air — useful for weather-sensitive users or those with allergies.

Today’s Weather Overview
Get a detailed forecast for the day — including temperature highs and lows, sunrise/sunset times, rain chances, and more — so you can plan ahead with confidence.

Search Weather for Any City
Type and search any city worldwide to get its current weather conditions. Whether you’re checking weather for travel, family, or business, the app makes it easy.

Weather Charts & History
View easy-to-read charts showing temperature and humidity changes over time. Track daily trends or analyze previous data to make informed decisions.

Experience the weather | Apple Design Award Winner

Prepare for your day with the most accurate hourly, 5-day, and 10-day forecasts. Stunning photos match your location, time of day, and current conditions. 

Favourite features:

-Get all the details: wind, pressure, and chance of precipitation.
-See animated sunrise, sunset, wind, and pressure modules.
-Browse interactive maps: radar, satellite, heat, and wind.
-Track all your favourite cities and destinations!
-Twice daily notifications help you be prepared, whatever the weather.

Helpful tips:

-Scroll down for detailed weather information.

-Swipe left-to-right to move between locations.

What people are saying:

"It's a million impressive little things. It's the blurring of the background; it's the subtle parallax scroll when flipping between cities; it's the way the windmills spin faster or slower based on the actual current windspeed." - Greg Kumparak, TechCrunch 

Tell us what you think:

We are committed to building the best mobile experiences and would love to hear your feedback.  Let us know your thoughts by tapping "Send feedback" in the app menu.

Detailed wind and weather forecasts for your location. 
See wind, waves, tides and weather reports and current wind measurements for your own weather predictions. Easy to use and free of charge.


FEATURES:

+ Detailed wind and weather forecasts for over 160,000 locations
+ Current wind and weather measurements in real-time from 21,000 weather stations
+ Tide forecasts with high and low tide based on 20,000 tide stations
+ Configure your favorites: save nearby spots and monitor the weather for your vacation
+ Animated wind map for a global wind overview
+ Small Wind Widgets (current conditions)
+ New: Severe weather warnings for Europe and the US
+ Measurements listed in knots, Beaufort, mph, km/h and m/s
+ Parameters: Wind speed, wind direction, gusts, air temperature, felt temperature, clouds coverage, precipitation, air pressure, wave height, wave period and wave direction
+ Webcams worldwide
+ Optimized display for optimal readability on the go and on any mobile device
+ Optimized data transfer for a quicker load speed
+ Topographic maps provide a quick overview of weather conditions and help with route planning
+ Easy to use interface - even with cold hands


PERFECT FOR:

• Kitesurfing & Windsurfing – find that next storm or windy days next door or at your next vacation
• Sailing – plan your next sailing trip and ensure safe passage by avoiding bad weather at sea
• Wing Foiling - Catch the best wind
• Surfing – find the perfect wave and high swell
• Dinghy sailing & regatta racers – prepare carefully for your next regatta
• SUP & Kayak – make sure high waves and wind don’t risk your adventures
• Paragliding – find a good wind right from the start
• Fishing – ensure a good catch with wind directions and tides
• Cycling, hiking & trekking – check if it will be windy on your route and take the right clothes and gear
• Boat owners & captains – keep an eye on the current wind conditions and tides
• ... anyone interested in reliable wind and weather predictions

INTERACTIVE WEATHER MAP

Zoom Earth is an interactive weather map of the world and a real-time tracker of storms and hurricanes.

Explore the current weather and see forecasts for your location through interactive weather maps of rain, wind, temperature, pressure, and more.

With Zoom Earth, you can track the development of storms, hurricanes, and severe weather, monitor wildfires and smoke, and stay aware of the latest conditions by viewing satellite imagery updated in near real‑time.



SATELLITE IMAGERY

Zoom Earth shows weather maps with near real-time satellite imagery. Images are updated every 10 minutes, with a delay between 20 and 40 minutes.

Live satellite images are updated every 10 minutes from NOAA GOES and JMA Himawari geostationary satellites. EUMETSAT Meteosat images are updated every 15 minutes.

HD satellite images are updated twice a day from NASA polar-orbiting satellites Aqua and Terra.



RAIN RADAR & NOWCAST

Stay ahead of the storm with our weather radar map, which shows rain and snow detected by ground-based Doppler radar in real-time, and provides an instant short-term weather forecast with radar nowcasting.



WEATHER FORECAST MAPS

Explore beautiful, interactive visualisations of the weather with our stunning global forecast maps. Our maps are continually updated with the latest weather forecast model data from DWD ICON and NOAA/NCEP/NWS GFS. Weather forecast maps include:

Precipitation Forecast - Rain, snow, and cloud cover, all in one map.

Wind Speed Forecast - Average speed and direction of surface winds.

Wind Gusts Forecast - Maximum speed of sudden bursts of wind.

Temperature Forecast - Air temperatures at 2 meters (6 feet) above the ground.

"Feels Like" Temperature Forecast - Perceived temperatures, also known as apparent temperature or heat index.

Relative Humidity Forecast - How air moisture compares to temperature.

Dew Point Forecast - How dry or humid the air feels, and the point at which condensation occurs.

Atmospheric Pressure Forecast - The average atmospheric pressure at sea level. Low-pressure areas often bring cloudy and windy weather. High-pressure areas are associated with clear skies and lighter winds.



HURRICANE TRACKING

Follow hurricanes from development to category 5 in real-time with our best-in-class tropical tracking system. Information is clear and easy to understand. Our hurricane tracking weather maps are updated using the very latest data from NHC, JTWC, NRL, and IBTrACS.



WILDFIRE TRACKING

Monitor wildfires with our active fires and heat spots overlay, which shows points of very high temperature detected by satellite. Detections are updated daily with data from NASA FIRMS. Use in conjunction with our GeoColor satellite imagery to see the movement of wildfire smoke and monitor fire weather in near real-time.



CUSTOMISATION

Adjust temperature units, wind units, time zone, animation styles, and many more features with our comprehensive settings.



ZOOM EARTH PRO

More features are available through auto-renewable subscriptions. Payment will be charged to your App Store account at the confirmation of purchase. The subscription will automatically renew at the end of each billing period and be charged within 24 hours, unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. For further information, please read our Terms of Service.

MyShake is a comprehensive and free earthquake app offering these features:

Earthquake Early Warnings
Receive timely, potentially life-saving early warning alerts in California, Oregon and Washington.  MyShake uses the USGS ShakeAlertTM system to deliver alerts for earthquakes of magnitude 4.5 (or greater) several seconds before shaking arrives.

Earthquake Safety
View safety tips for earthquake preparedness such as securing hazardous or moveable items and creating a disaster plan. Know what to do during an earthquake and learn more about Drop, Cover and Hold On!

Earthquake Map and Details
View and explore a map of earthquakes around the world and get detailed information such as earthquake magnitude, location and depth. Share your own experience of an earthquake and see community reports of shaking and damage.

Earthquake Notifications
Stay informed of earthquakes as they occur by receiving notifications on your phone. Select your regions of interest and the earthquake magnitude. You’ll never miss out on any earthquake greater than magnitude 3.5!

Smartphone-Based Global Seismic Network
Participate in a smartphone-based global seismic network. In this research project, your phone becomes a mini-seismometer and contributes to the detection of earthquakes wherever you are.   This global citizen-science based seismic network has the potential to provide early warning earthquake alerts in every region of the world, even in the absence of traditional seismic networks!

About Us
MyShake is developed by the University of California, Berkeley, Seismology Lab and funded by the California Governor’s Office of Emergency Services.   The Berkeley Seismology Lab conducts essential research on earthquakes and solid earth processes while collecting and delivering high quality geophysical data.

MyShake is available in English, Spanish (Español), Chinese Traditional (繁體中文), Filipino, Korean (한국인), and Vietnamese (Tiếng Việt).

MyShake is available to everyone for free with no ads and no subscription!

Learn more at http://myshake.berkeley.edu/

Built by a small team, Rain Viewer delivers the most accurate and immediate short-term rain predictions straight from raw radar data. No third-party providers - our independent, professional-grade processing is trusted by millions of users, countless indie developers, and major weather companies. Dive into weather with unmatched detail, real-time data, and a sleek, modern interface designed specifically for weather enthusiasts.

Why Rain Viewer?
• Ultimate Precision & Speed: Maximum resolution radar data at original quality, delivered instantly from weather radars with zero delay. Professional radar products, including reflectivity, velocity, spectrum width, differential reflectivity, differential phase, correlation coefficient, and more, across all available tilts for US and selected European weather radars.
• Professional Experience: 48-hour radar history, 2-hour forecasts (5-minute updates), and long-term models (ICON, ICON-EU, GFS, HRRR, ECMWF) for 72-hour precipitation/temperature data, plus 72-hour hourly forecasts and 14-day daily outlook.
• Independent Data: We process every pixel in-house, pulling raw radar feeds for a completely autonomous weather view.
• Modern UX: Intuitive, clean interface with Metal-powered 60fps vector maps and unique precipitation direction arrows showing real-time storm movement.
• Total Customisation: Fine-tune alerts, thresholds, colour schemes, and multi-location settings to your exact specifications.

Advanced Tools:
• Completely free standalone Apple Watch app with radar, satellite maps, forecasts, severe alerts, and complications - fully functional without an iPhone.
• Free weather radar widgets for home and lock screens with precipitation direction arrows.
• Live Activities with dynamic minute-by-minute rain intensity graphs.
• Severe weather alerts directly from National Weather Services.
• Best-in-class hurricane tracking with timed alerts telling you exactly when the hurricane will be closest to your location.

Your Privacy, Our Promise:
No data collection or sales. Location used solely for forecasts and alerts. Every installation starts fresh - no user history stored.

Join millions who trust Rain Viewer for storm chasing, hiking, or planning outdoor activities. See precipitation with precision and clarity.

PRO Plan: Monthly: £8.99 | Quarterly: £19.99 | Annual: £39.99 (Auto-renewal can be disabled in App Store settings).

Discover a reliable, real-time and hyper-local forecast that will always warn you about upcoming severe weather. Weather Underground combines data from over 250,000+ personal weather stations and a proprietary forecast model to give you the most accurate and hyperlocal forecasts, at a microclimate level. Discover about current conditions, interactive Nexrad radar, get customizable severe weather alerts and much more. You’ll always be prepared for whatever the weather brings.


5 REASONS TO DOWNLOAD WEATHER UNDERGROUND

• Severe weather alerts: set weather alerts for your exact position, so you can always be prepared for an upcoming storm!
• Local conditions: get current weather conditions from local weather stations and hourly/daily summary forecasts up to 10 days in the future, which include chance of precipitation and daily weather summaries.
• Most detailed weather data: stay updated with the best weather data including temperature, “Feels Like,” wind speed, wind directions, today’s rain accumulation, humidity, dew point, visibility, and pressure.
• Other geographical data: discover our air quality index, UV index, local flu outbreaks, sunrise & sunset and moonrise & moonset.
• Customized experience: set your app with light & dark modes, various map types and units.


DISCOVER THE UNIQUE FEATURES OF WEATHER UNDERGROUND
• Interactive radar maps & severe weather:
• The most interactive weather map on mobile allows you to select from different weather overlays, personal weather stations, nexrad radar, satellite, heat maps, and rain accumulation.
• Sophisticated weather visualizations with hi-res satellite & cloud cover imagery from GOES-16, powered by data from NOAA.
• Keep an eye out for extreme weather and always be prepared with severe weather alerts.


Accurate hyper-local forecasts:
• Over 250,000 personal weather stations report the most accurate local weather conditions.
• Made to fill in the gaps between the airport weather stations that other weather services rely upon to generate forecasts - meaning our data is generated from actual data points in your neighborhood.


Subscribe to Premium!
• Upgrade and remove all ads from your weather app by purchasing an annual subscription.
• Access Smart Forecasts: set your ideal weather conditions for your outdoor activities and we’ll tell you when to go.
• View Extended Hourly Forecasts up to 15 days in the future.


You can cancel your Weather Underground subscription anytime through your iTunes account settings, or it will automatically renew. This must be done 24 hours before the end of any subscription period to avoid being charged another fee. Subscription payments will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of your purchase and upon commencement of each renewal term. For more information, please see our Privacy Policy and Terms of Use.

Weather like you’ve never seen before with the Storm Radar app for iOS! Full-screen interactive map with 8 hours of high-definition (HD) past to future radar, advanced storm cell tracking and real-time severe weather alerts allow you to visualise weather heading your way. Whether you want to view current weather conditions or daily and hourly forecasts, they’re all available at a glance on your iPhone or iPad in Portrait and Landscape modes.

FEATURES

• Radar: High-resolution weather radar.
• Global Future Radar: 6 hours of cutting-edge, animated forecasted future radar across land and sea.
• Storm Tracks: See detailed analysis of impending severe weather, including storm arrival time, strength rating, detailed components of the storm (such as wind, hail, lightning, and tornadoes), the speed and direction of the storm, the precipitation rate, storm tracker data and more.
• Hurricanes and Tropical Storms: See historical and forecasted paths complete with wind speed, strength, arrival times and the cone of uncertainty.
• Lightning: View 100 miles of lightning around any continental US location and 50 miles of lightning around any global location.
• Customisable Data Layers: Earthquakes, severe weather alerts, local storm reports, temperature and precipitation overlays and more.
• Local Storm Reports: Get local weather radar and severe weather warnings from anywhere in the US and around the globe, including Miami, Orlando, Chicago, Minneapolis and St Louis.

REAL-TIME WEATHER NOTIFICATIONS
• Severe Weather Alerts: Stay ahead of the storm with National Weather Service government-issued severe weather alerts.
• Rain Alerts: Be notified of incoming rain with real-time rain alerts at your GPS location
• Lightning Alerts: Know when and where lightning strikes near your GPS location with real-time lightning alerts

Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.
